Text: Wanderer, I just wanted to say Thank You very much for the great uploads.

Information has surfaced that System Shock 2 is going to be released at Good Old Games in a day or so. If you can acquire it, please upload it Wanderer and thansk again for your great work regarding GOG uploads!

Hi Wanderer, I've torrented every single one of the wing commander games, but I'm having a very hard time finding an easy Wing Commander IV torrent. I was wondering if you can help me and maybe some others that want to explore Chris Robert's universe for the new upcoming Star Citizen game. I think you'd be a real hero if you could get a GOG version of it here... please?
Also, if the same message is repeated, I'm really sorry. Getting some bad lag on here.
